actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to make a grant to the Traverse City Area Public School District for demolition and removal of a structure at former Coast Guard property located in Traverse City, Michigan.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to make a grant to the Traverse City Area Public School District for the demolition and removal of Building 402 at former Coast Guard property located in Traverse City, Michigan.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to make a grant to the Traverse City Area Public School District for demolition and removal of a structure at former Coast Guard property located in Traverse City, Michigan.
